verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR In the thrombin generation assay, rivaroxaban and apixaban influenced all parameters in a concentration dependent manner, although rivaroxaban prolonged the lag time and reduced ETP to a significantly greater extent than apixaban.
evidence: apixaban influenced all parameters in a concentration-dependent manner, although rivaroxaban prolonged the lag
